extension.name: S5 News Ticker
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: This module will display one line of text in a fading transition. You can choose Mootools or S5 Effects javascript.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Enter the height of the text fader.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Enter the width of the text fader.

field.name: xml_s5_jsmoos5
field.label: Choose Javascript:
field.description: Choose the Javascript to power this module, recommended Mootools, if you experience conflicts choose S5 Effects

field.name: xml_s5_mooarrows
field.label: Choose To Hide/Show Arrows
field.description: If you are using the Mootools library then you can choose to enable or disable the arrows for navigation between the lines of text

field.name: tween_time
field.label: Tween Time (in seconds)
field.description: The amount of time in seconds an text line takes to fade.

field.name: display_time
field.label: Display Time (in seconds)
field.description: How many seconds will each text line display for?

field.name: spacer2
field.label: You may enter up to 10 lines of text with HTML code included. If you do not wish to use 10 simply leave the extra fields blank. IMPORTANT - Do not leave fields blank between text lines, ie: If you are only using 4 text lines then fields for text lines 1,2,3,4 should be filled in, not text lines 1,3,5,6 or any other order like it.

field.name: text1line
field.label: Text Line 1 (leave blank if none)
field.description: Enter the text of line 1, leave blank if none.
